Index.title: Hello world!

meta.title: Gran Vellas Urbanismo - Launch of the Jericoacoara Real Estate Development
meta.description: Gran Vellas Urbanismo is pleased to announce the launch of our new real estate development, Jericoacoara. Located about 300 km from Fortaleza, Jeri is a charming fishing village and one of the most sought-after destinations for travelers.
meta.metakeyswords: Real Estate Development, Launch, Jericoacoara, Gran Vellas Urbanismo, Developer, Properties, Prime Location, Fishing Village, Beautiful Beaches, Tourist Attractions

Index.MainBanner: A piece of paradise: Invest in Jericoacoara.
Index.MainBannerThanks: ¡Gracias por contactarnos! Nuestro WhatsApp a continuación.

assessment.mainTitle: A unique investment with complete infrastructure for you

money.title: Easy purchase in up to 84 installments directly with the developer

assessment.client1: Wonderful development, close to several tourist spots and we are very happy with the acquisition. Since the time we acquired it, there has been an appreciation.
assessment.client2: I met Gran Vellas on the internet, I felt super safe, I saw that it was a wonderful investment, in a paradise that is Jericoacoara... They were very attentive, I approved everything and of course, I made the investment of my life.

download.LoteJuri: Security and transparency in your Investment

Footer.Talk: Talk to one of our brokers

FooterNotes.title: LEGAL NOTICE
FooterNotes.p: * Installments valid for lot 23 of 250.05m², not including the 7 annual installments of R$ 12,502.50, both installments and balloons will be annually adjusted by IPCA+6%. (check the table and availability with your broker).
FooterNotes.ptwo: We reserve the right to change any information or value provided for the offered lots and their accessories (condominium, property tax, etc.), both on our website and in any other means of communication or promotion of offers without prior notice.
FooterNotes.ptree: We also reserve the right to only assist those customers who identify themselves with full name, landline or mobile phone, and email, and the property is exclusively for their use and interest. Customers who refuse to provide such information, unfortunately, will not be able to receive assistance, whether for sale or various questions, no matter how simple they may be; Customers who contact us requesting information for third parties must provide, in addition to their own data, the data of the third party interested in order to avoid duplicate service and communication failures.

blogPosting1.title: Jericoacoara:
blogPosting1.description: Considered one of the most visited beaches in the world, Jericoacoara is a growing destination for national and international ventures. The Ceará paradise is the chosen location for the first launch of Gran Vellas Urbanismo in the real estate market.

blogPosting2.title: Ceará is expected to receive more than
blogPosting2.description: The expectations of the Ceará Tourism Secretariat (Setur) are positive. The estimate is that Ceará will receive 133 thousand travelers on the holiday, an increase of 18.8% compared to the 112 thousand received last year.

blogPosting3.title: Gran Vellas Wind, in Jericoacoara will be just
blogPosting3.titlespan: 5 minutes from one of the biggest tourist spots in the city: the Alchymist Beach Club.
blogPosting3.description: Located in Lagoa do Paraíso, only 18km from Jericoacoara, the Alchymist Beach Club is another one of the Alchymist group's properties around the world.

blogPosting4.title: Get to know the best village of Jericoacoara,
blogPosting4.titlespan: close to Gran Vellas Wind in Jeri!
blogPosting4.description: The village, located about 300 km from Fortaleza, more precisely in the city of Jijoca de Jericoacoara, is a quiet place, with sandy streets and bucolic scenarios, ideal for those who want to rest and renew their energies!
